moves.1. f4: this player, already stole my heart: not many players, dare to open like this...
moves.1... d5: the Dutch reversed: Double Dutch; when will the fun ever stop?
moves.2. Nf3 c5 3. e3 Nc6 4. Be2 e6 5. O-O Bd6: not much happening here: White has followed a slow version of this opening...
moves.8. Qg3 g6 9. e4 O-O-O 10. e5 Be7: the start of a dance, around the center...
moves.14... Nxf6 15. b4 h3 16. g3 Ng4 17. d4 c: taking the pawn hostage: this rules out, any action across the a-file...
moves.21. Ne5 Nxe5 22. fxe5 Rdf8: elemantary: take out the free file for the Rook...
moves.34... Nf3+: after this, Black can always replace the Queen: but it is already over; the White King will be mated...
moves.35. Kh1: forced: this is the only place for the King...
